name: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Scouts Prosperity Pack
name_original: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Scouts Prosperity Pack
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will give you exclusive premium skins of KATO Scouts.

This Bundle includes:

- Ronin Prosperity Age premium skin - Wyvern Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Techwars Global Conflict - The Game
